name: HH_INTVTN_ENC
description: Contains Home Health care plan intervention overtime single items information.

columns.name: INTERVENTION_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the care plan intervention.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: Unique identifier for this contact for this patient.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: ID of the contact owner deployment for this record.  Links to table CL_COMMUNTY_INSTNC.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: User ID of person who edited care plan intervention data.  Links to table CLARITY_EMP.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: EDIT_INSTANT
columns.description: Instant at which care plan intervention was edited.

columns.name: INTV_FREQ_ID
columns.description: Care plan intervention frequency ID.  Links to table IP_FREQUENCY.

columns.name: INTV_FREQ_ID_FREQ_NAME
columns.description: The name of the frequency record.

columns.name: CARE_PLAN_CSN
columns.description: Link to care plan contact.  Used to recreate historic versions of care plan.

columns.name: HAS_PENDED_ORDER_YN
columns.description: Determines whether the intervention order was created but not sent. This is set to Yes if any user created an intervention order without sending it; No if an order is not created or it was created and already sent.

columns.name: HOME_CARE_ORDER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the supplemental order ID that is created or generated for care plan intervention edit.
